SEARCH
Package me.desertfox.dgen.shard

Class ShardGenerator

java.lang.Object
me.desertfox.dgen.shard.ShardGenerator
Direct Known Subclasses:
BetterIsaacGenerator, ConnectedDoorsGenerator, GameGenerator, IsaacLikeGenerator, MazeGenerator, SimpleGenerator, VoidGenerator, WeightedSimpleGenerator
public abstract class ShardGenerator extends Object
The ShardGenerator class manages the process of generating rooms
and other objects into a shard

If you made a new ShardGenerator subclass then don't forget to register it register(Class)
Otherwise it won't be accessible

Keep in mind every instance of your class will represent a shard

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected List<RoomSchematic>
    roomPool
    The roomPool allows for ChunkGenerators to store the room names they want to use
    It is not mandatory to use this system, it can be easily avoided and the system doesn't force
    you to use this
